name: Lunar Lander (itch) (Joker Gaming from Game Gen)
name_original: Lunar Lander (itch) (Joker Gaming from Game Gen)
description:
This is my 3rd game I made in Game Gen from the lesson the game looks challenging I bet someone can play this for fun.

The game doesn't have an end screen from what it seems but you have to be careful not to hit the mountains or try to land the ship properly and not crash it.

The game is a single player and the controls are

Up arrow=to accelerate up Left arrow=to turn left Right arrow=to turn right

Seems pretty simple hope you can challenge yourself playing this game and have fun!
